newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: RESEARCH ALERT - TGS initiated as hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - TGS initiated as hold.

text.p: - ABN-AMRO said it initiated Argentina's Transportadora de Gas del Sur as hold.
- "Growth prospects for TGS are not inspiring but it is a solid, low-risk investment option with a high yield," analyst Myles McDougall wrote in a research report.
- He said 97 percent of TGS's transportation capacity is subscribed under firm contracts and the company offers one of the highest dividend yields in Latin America, at 7.8 percent.
- McDougall said TGS is "correctly" valued and his one-year target is $13.50 per share. It traded at $12-1/4 in New York Monday afternoon. ((Gary Regenstreif, Buenos Aires newsroom, 541 318-0618))
